description: Erection of single storey rear extension (6.00m in depth, maximum height of 3.50m and eaves height of 3.00m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension is considered to fall within the parameters of  permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

No work must be undertaken on the public highway without a Section 278 agreement being in place. No materials must be stored on the public highway unless this has been expressly permitted by RBK Highways. The applicant should also contact the Highways Inspections Team to arrange for a highway condition survey to be undertaken before commencing these works.

For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the descriotion 'Details required for Condition3 (Details and Samples of Materials), Condition 4 (Details of Appearance), Condition 5 (Construction Management Plan), Condition 6 (Level), Condition 9 (Heritage Assets of Archaeological Interest), Condition 10 (Drainage Strategy), Condition 12 (Landscape), Condition 13 (District Heating Network), Condition 14 (Refuse and Recycling), Condition 15 (Cycle Parking), Condition 16 (Car Parking), Condition 17 (Electric Vehicle Charging Plan), Condition 18 (Fire Strategy), Condition 21(Temperature Assessment),  Condition 22(Flood Risk Management Plan), Condition 25 (Bird Nesting), Condition 26(Biodiversity Enhancement Strategy), Condition 29 (Air Quality Assessment) and Condition 30 (Piling Method Statement) of planning permission 21/01827/FUL (Demolition of existing building and erection of 3 storey building (Use Class C3) consisting of 13no. self-contained residential units. Alterations to site layout, provision of 12no. external car parking spaces, with associated cycle and waste storage and garden landscaping. Erection of boundary wall with provision of two front access gates).'If you do not agree with the description, please amend it in your own words.
